TopicTitle: i don't know if this very much related to ksp 2 development

Articles.Content: Hi  i think my question ask before or not but do we know what is the mimimum hardware to run ksp 2 ? i have 16GB of ram CPU : AMD Ryzen 3 2200G GPU : NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti  and 230 Go SSD and a basic hard drive of 110 Go so it will be  to enough run it?
We don't know. All the speculation that has been done on the minimum/recommended specs subject hasn't helped much with narrowing it down.

If I had to be money Yes you should be fine. 

I assume KSP 2 will have the same bottlenecks as the first game, where the CPU is the first main constraint, followed by the GPU (for rendering the heavier graphics) and RAM. So its possible you wont be able to play the game with max graphic settings with giant multi-part crafts, but you should be fine playing the game.

 

Plus, if Unity should be able to optimize the game enough to at least let it be playable on decently weaker machines. That doesn't mean the game will run fantastic, but it should at least run.
